column3: this is move-only, btw. With the exception of a few obvious header changes and forward-declares.\n
Concept ACK; I didn't verify the move.\n
ACK, verified move-only apart from (necessary) #include, comment and pre-declared classes changes.\n
ACK, verified that the code in streams.h is move-only.\n
Thanks for moving these to a separate include file. Indeed, they don't belong with serialize itself.\n
